Name: Salt & Light Food Pantry
Description: Winfield Church of the Nazarene has a food pantry called Salt and Light Food Pantry. The pantry gives out food to Putnam County residents.HoursOn the second Saturday of every month 9:00am - 12:00pm. We also have special pantries for Thanksgiving and Christmas.
